column6:
The unit is a 2 bedroom / 1.5 bath apartment located in the Fleur de Lis complex, on Timmons Lane, Located in Highland Village/Galleria/ Greenway with convenient access to 610 and 59 fwy. It is about 5 min from the Galleria, 10 min from Houston DowntownMedical Center are 10 mins out from the apt.
Amenities are:
hardwood floors
walk-in closets
wifi internet
2 TVS in each room
kitchen
column9: Affordable and cozy 1 bed and bath
